info.title: Inference Server
info.description: The inference service handles requests using the query service and OpenAI.

post.description: Handles a chat message sent within a session.

get.description: Lists connectors ('sources' in app-ui such as 'deductive' and 'git').

schema.title: Response List Connectors Proto Route Api V1 Infer List Connectors Get

post.description: Handles a chat message sent within a session.

Fetch GitHub repositories for a specified customer.

Args:
    request: GithubRepositoriesRequest containing customer information

Returns:
    List of GithubRepository objects containing repository information

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the GitHub API request fails

schema.title: Response Get Github Repositories Proto Route Api V1 Github Repositories Post

post.description:
Fetch GitHub releases for a specified repository.

Args:
    request: GithubReleaseRequest containing owner and repo information

Returns:
    List of GithubRelease objects containing release information

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the GitHub API request fails

schema.title: Response Get Github Release Proto Route Api V1 Github Release Post
Response Get Pr Route Api V1 Github Pr Post
Response Get Branches Route Api V1 Github Branch List Post
Response Get Alert Route Api V1 Newrelic Alert Post
Response Get Datadog Alert Route Api V1 Datadog Alert Post

get.description: Returns a list of supported models.

schema.title: Response Get Supported Models Api V1 Infer Supported Models Get

ConnectorType.title: ConnectorType
ConnectorType.description: Enum representing different types of connectors.

EndOfMessageEnvelope.title: EndOfMessageEnvelope
EndOfMessageEnvelope.description: Signals that the current message stream is complete.

ProgressEnvelope.title: ProgressEnvelope
ProgressEnvelope.description: A chunk carrying one or more progress updates.

ProgressMessage.title: ProgressMessage
ProgressMessage.description: Single progress update emitted by an executor/tool.
